strategies.name: Grid Trading (Long Volatility)
strategies.description: Profit from oscillations in high-vol environment. Grid catches every bounce and dip regardless of direction.
strategies.rationale: ETH is most liquid, will have largest absolute swings. F&G=8 means 3-5% daily swings likely. Grid profits from each oscillation. Low leverage (2x) to survive volatility.
strategies.exit_condition: F&G recovers above 25 OR daily loss >15%

strategies.name: Funding Rate Harvest
strategies.description: Go long coins with negative funding. Shorts are crowded and paying longs every hour on Hyperliquid.
strategies.rationale: UNI has most negative funding (-2.8% annualized). On Hyperliquid, funding is paid EVERY HOUR. Going long = collecting funding from shorts. In extreme fear, shorts get more crowded = funding goes more negative = more income. Even if price drops 2%, funding income can offset. If shorts unwind (squeeze), both price + funding profit.
strategies.exit_condition: Funding turns positive OR price drops >4% from entry

strategies.name: Mean Reversion Sniper
strategies.description: Wait for extreme oversold bounce. F&G=8 historically precedes sharp reversals. Position for the snapback.

params.trigger: RSI7 < 20 AND positive CVD divergence (price making new low but CVD not)

strategies.rationale: ARB OI dropped 9% = mass liquidation already happened. CRV RSI at 21. When fear peaks, the bounce is violent. 3x leverage on a confirmed reversal signal with tight 3% SL gives 3:1 R/R.
strategies.exit_condition: TP hit OR no trigger within 4 hours → reallocate to grid

risk_rules.kill_switch: If account drops below $20, close ALL positions and switch to grid-only with $15
